ORIGAM Documentation : Rule Set Reference

Created by Zuzana Čapková, last modified on Jun 10, 2019

Rule Set Reference is used when you want to refer to another already created Rule Set. That is practical e.g. for Context Stores in Sequential Workflows, because you don't have to create the rule sets again, you can just combine the existing ones as needed.
